question_1.question: What is the likely cause of the error 'Could not load file or assembly' when using TimeXtender?
question_1.explanation: The error is caused by missing SQL Shared Management Objects (SMO), which are necessary for creating tables and other SQL objects from TimeXtender.

question_2.question: If you are deploying to multiple versions of SQL Server, what must you do to resolve the 'Could not load file or assembly' error?

options.option_a: Install the latest version of TimeXtender on all servers
options.option_b: Install the latest version of SQL Server Management Studio on all servers
options.option_c: Install all relevant versions of SMO/XMO for each SQL Server version
options.option_d: Only install the newest client libraries for Azure

question_2.explanation: When deploying to multiple versions of SQL Server, you must install all relevant versions of SMO/XMO to ensure compatibility with each version.
